text: "Where am I...?"
You're confused and your head hurts. As if you have been hit. You look around the room that is dimly lit by the rising full moon. Are you at home?

No... You remember now. You are in a small bungalow on vacation, the well-deserved vacation with your friend on a paradise island. Speaking of, where is your friend? You look around the room. You get a strange feeling in your gut. Something's wrong.
You should CHECK the ROOM or your friend's BED. Or maybe you should just GO somewhere. You hear a faint noise from OUTSIDE.

Objects.Name: room
Text: The bungalow room is tiny. There is only room for two beds, a small cabinet with a television on top that barely fits. You notice the open BATHROOM door that's next to the entrance DOOR.

Objects.Name: bed
Text: You see a silhouette that resembles your friend on the bed. You touch your friend gently but realize that it was all an illusion. It's just the cover and pillows. Your friend is not here.

text: You're back in the bungalow where you woke up.
Scenes.Title: INT. BUNGALOW - NIGHT

Objects.Name: room
Text: The bungalow room is tiny. There is only room for two beds, a small cabinet with a television on top that barely fits. You notice the open BATHROOM door that's next to the entrance DOOR.

Objects.Name: bed
Text: You see a silhouette that resembles your friend on the bed. You touch your friend gently but realize that it was all an illusion. It's just the cover and pillows. Your friend is not here.

text: The full moon light illuminates the balcony. Even though it is hot outside the balcony tiles are chilly and slippery.
There is another bungalow nearby. You see a shadowy figure hunched over the other bungalow''s balcony.
You can GO DOWN the stairs to get to the other bungalow or GO back INSIDE your own bungalow.
Scenes.Title: EXT. BUNGALOW BALCONY - NIGHT

text: You're in the bathroom.
The bathroom is dark and really small. There is nothing of interest here. There appears to be a wrinkled NOTE in the trash can. ITEM_DESCRIPTIONS
You can GO back to the ROOM you came from.
Scenes.Title: INT. BUNGALOW BATHROOM - NIGHT

Items.Name: Note
Items.Description: There appears to be a wrinkled NOTE in the trash can.
Items.InventoryDescription: The note is from your friend; you recognize their handwriting.

Actions.Text: The note reads: "What is this feeling? I shouldn't have gone near that person at the party. I guess I'll I have no choice than to be honest w ht"... The note ends abruptly.

Items.Name: Brk. Bottle
Items.Description: There is a broken BOTTLE on the sink.
Items.InventoryDescription: You don't drink so this bottle was left and broken by your friend.

text: You're standing between your bungalow and the the neighbouring bungalow. The vehicle you and your friend rented is gone but the neighbour's JEEP is still parked.
You can GO back HOME to your bungalow or walk to up the stairs to your neighbour's BUNGALOW where the shadowy figure is.
Scenes.Title: EXT. BETWEEN BUNGALOWS - NIGHT

text: The bungalow is much like yours but it smells nicer. You clearly got ripped off.
Scenes.Title: INT. NEIGHBOUR BUNGALOW - NIGHT

text: You see the shadowy figure hunching over the balcony railing.
You can GO INSIDE or GO DOWN the stairs.
Scenes.Title: EXT. NEIGHBOUR BUNGALOW BALCONY - NIGHT

text: You're by the village gas station. Station might be an overstatement as it is just a rusty tank with a wooden roof over it. The car has broken down. You have no choice but to enter the village.
You can GO to the village road PROMENADE or ,,,
Scenes.Title: EXT. VILLAGE GAS STATION - DAWN

text: You visit the harbor in hopes of leaving the island. There are several motor-driven fishing boats. The two closest boats seem to have people in them. Your hopes lie with the third fishing boat. You will need to pass the two boats nearby in order to reach the third BOAT.
You can go back to the BEACH or go to the STORE.
Scenes.Title: EXT. VILLAGE HARBOR - DAWN

text: You take the JEEP to the village. You reach the gas STATION.
Scenes.Title: INT. JEEP - NIGHT

text: The village road promenade is a paved road that you remember taking from the harbor past the gas station to the bungalow yesterday when you arrived. You can see the harbor from here.
You spot the JEEP that you rented yesterday. It has crashed into one of the houses. There is smoke coming from the JEEP.
You can reach the harbor by going to the BEACH or you can go back to the gas STATION.
Scenes.Title: EXT. ROAD PROMENADE - DAWN

text: promenade beach.
Scenes.Title: EXT. PROMENADE BEACH - DAWN
